line_1: Their Slaves, at Work, to chat it merrily.
line_2: Have Mutes to serve them, or did e'er deny
The milk maids sing so cheerily,

line_1: They praised are alone, and starve right merrily.
line_2: As ruthless Wasps oft rob the painful Bee:

line_1: They praised are alone, and starve right merrily.
line_2: Ne for the Muses other Meed decree,
Then strike we up the rousing glee,
